sentences.english: Or can seduce the sea demon that the person goes to perdition?
sentences.chinese: 还是能勾引人下地狱的海妖？

sentences.english: Fox bewitching appendages is on UIMI body, close little younger brother is south immense forest.
sentences.chinese: 狐妖附体在UIMI身体上，并收林海南为小弟。

sentences.english: Interestingly, Sylvanas is connected to the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，西瓦娜斯和巫妖王是相连的。

sentences.english: Lobster genie and Bloop played happily together.
sentences.chinese: 龙虾妖和布噜卟一起快乐地玩耍。

sentences.english: When Nefarious Lich leaves play, you lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 当极恶巫妖离场时，你输掉此盘游戏。

sentences.english: Always remember that here is Journey to Guanyin urged him to refrain from eating demon Ende.
sentences.chinese: 这里八戒是时时记得观音曾劝他不要为妖吃人的恩德。

sentences.english: The Blood elves ally with the Naga.
Alleged sorcery by fox demons occasionally caused collective panics.
sentences.chinese: 宣扬狐妖巫术偶尔会引发群体的恐慌。

sentences.english: The Blood Elves and Naga flee through the portal to Draenor.
sentences.chinese: 血精灵与海妖通过德拉诺的时空门逃跑。

sentences.english: AT: Are you planning on bringing any of the old characters back into "Lich King?" (Something that dates before World of Warcraft, lore-wise. )
sentences.chinese: 你们计划在巫妖王之怒中将老的人物带入么？

sentences.english: Wrath of the Lich King will introduce a vast new land and many new dungeons to the game.
sentences.chinese: 巫妖王之怒将介绍大量的新地区和新地下城到游戏中。

sentences.english: The boy and his six friends met on Saturday night to play the nysläppta Wrath of the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩和他的六个朋友在周六晚开始玩巫妖王之怒。

sentences.english: As one of the undead, Sylvanas was subject to the iron will of the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 作为不死族的一员，希尔瓦娜斯屈从于巫妖王的意志。

sentences.english: These two different ways of looking at things have influenced in each country the whole world of sprites and goblins.
sentences.chinese: 对待事物的两种不同方式也影响到两地的神妖世界。

sentences.english: Kim believe nine younger sister not fox demon, so for her advice.
sentences.chinese: 金珠相信九妹并非狐妖，于是为她出主意。

definition: supernatural being (such as a demon, monster, ghost, spirit, gremlin etc)
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
